item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:

7. Making Castro’s Feeds Update Faster the Lazy Way (51 points | 6 comments)

12. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (264 points | 64 comments)

24. The history of the barcode (67 points | 22 comments)
25. Janus: Decoupling Visual Encoding for Multimodal Understanding and Generation (12 points | discuss)
26. Internet Archive breached again through stolen access tokens (440 points | 281 comments)
27. VersaTiles – a complete FLOSS map stack (144 points | 17 comments)

29. Memory safety without lifetime parameters (88 points | 30 comments)
